items.content_html: API Error Detector is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of monitoring API errors directly within your browser. Instead of manually inspecting network requests in the browser's DevTools, this extension highlights and displays failed API responses, allowing for faster troubleshooting and debugging.
items.title: Chrislujo/api-error-extenstion: API Error Detector is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of monitoring API errors directly within your browser. Instead of manually inspecting network requests in the browser's DevTools, this extension highlights and displays failed API responses, allowing for faster troubleshooting and debugging.

items.content_html: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.

It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.
